overview:
Carlo has a background in web-based businesses and is an ex management consultant having worked in Australia and Europe for companies including Bain & Company, IBM and Accenture. Carlo helped organise the largest education event for young entrepreneurs in Australian history. Carlo is an established business strategist in Digital & eCommerce.

Media exposure includes being featured on the Sydney Morning Herald and live on The Morning Show, as well as The Australian Financial Review’s BOSS Magazine.

Specialties – eCommerce (Strategy, Optimisation & Site Development) – Customer Relationship & Database Management – Free Digital Marketing Strategies – Conversion Optimisation – Fundamentals of on-site SEO Strategy - Statistical Analysis - Online Advertising
